column4: Neumind; Do you have X-Chat systray installed? I kept getting that message until I took that off
no i dont have, wher i get it?
In Synaptic
But I thought that might be the problem
and more write - Unknown host. Maybe you misspelled it?
Okay. You're not connecting at all, then.
whats a problem then?
Probably spelling of the host name
Check the hostname and or the address carefully, then try again
ok
I know all about that problem. :) My spelling is bad
i write this in to startv6.sh - #!/bin/sh
/sbin/ifconfig sit0 up
/sbin/ip -f inet6 route add 2002::/16 dev sit0 metric 1
/sbin/ip -f inet6 route add default via ::192.88.99.1
and this -#!/bin/sh
/sbin/ifconfig sit0 add 2002:c3c:b0e6::1/48
/sbin/ifconfig sit0 add 2002:c3c:b0e6::2/48
I'm not sure why you are using the -f option. Are you sure that's correct?
i dont know
Neither do I. Guess we will have to read the man page again, eh?
Hello, Syonyde
